author: EXM7777
text:
gemini 3 is exceptional at thinking in systems...

here's how i found out:

i run an SEO agency, 90% of client delivery is handled by automations

it's been a while since i actually improved these systems... beyond just upgrading models, i mean

so i fed gemini 3 everything:
- business context
- what we're achieving
- the complete workflow
- every tool we use

used this dead-simple prompt:
"analyze this workflow, find flaws, cost-saving opportunities and quality improvements"

it thought for a bit... then gave me a ridiculously practical to-do list

what surprised me is how it's so good at using tools to catch small details that have huge impact

i tried the changes... quality went up & speed went up

i used it on keyword research using ahrefs + perplexity and gemini's new system found smart keywords i would have missed
